trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.
The array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects with which to initialize the new object.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> with which to initialize the new object.

Adds an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> with the specified value to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to add to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

The index into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at which the new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> was inserted.

Copies the elements of an array of type <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to the end of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

The array of type <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> containing the objects to add to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The value parameter is `null`.

Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> to the end of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> containing the objects to add to the collection.
The value parameter is `null`.

Gets a value indicating whether the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to locate.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> is contained in this collection; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> values in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> instance at the specified index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The index into array to begin copying.
The array parameter is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between arrayIndex and the end of array.
The array parameter is `null`.
The arrayIndex parameter is less than the array parameter's lower bound.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> you can use to iterate through the collection.
Builds a hash value based on all values contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
A hash value based on all values contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to locate.
The index of the specified by the value parameter in the , if found; otherwise, -1.

Inserts a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index where value should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets the entry at the specified index of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> at the specified index of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The index parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.

Removes a specific <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> from the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to remove from the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
The specified by the value parameter is not found in the current .
